GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles. Articles can be sorted by each column, ordered asc or desc, filtered by topic, defaults to a limit of 10 articles, and users can navigate the pages

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves the selected article based on id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves the comments of a selected article based on id. Defaults to a limit of 10 comments per page and users can navigate the pages

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves the selected user based on username

article.author: rogersop
article.title: There's a new moewvelous cat in town!
article.body: Her name is Melor. She like belly scratches and St Luke's Garden

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to a selected article based on id

comment.body: Hit me up if you wanna sell your wheelz
comment.author: icellusedkars

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the article vote to a selected article based on id

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the article vote to a selected article based on id

comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment from an article based on id
